pkgmetadata.longdescription: pyfatfs is a filesystem module for use with PyFilesystem2 for anyone who needs to access or modify files on a FAT filesystem. It also provides a low-level API that allows direct interaction with a FAT filesystem without PyFilesystem2 abstraction. pyfatfs supports FAT12/FAT16/FAT32 as well as the VFAT extension (long file names).
